RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 300 Y Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JAZACK speed, held. WHYDRIVEWHENICANFLY fought gamely. JJ CORONA JESS drifted out, best late. JTF PATRIOT game effort. AIR CAV PILOTO solid try. RH ZANCUDITO FLASH even effort. TTTWHATYANO closer than looks.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 7000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOMETOWN BAR bumped, dueled, prevailed. ZOOMIN GAME dueled, outfinished. AJS MAXIN OUT bumped both sides. JW EXPLODING CORONA slight hop, one paced. RM PATRIOT PATRON broke in, bumped, late run. FABULOUS CAROLINE bried speed, faded. SIR RUN AND JUMP lost path early, outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 220 Y Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Claiming Purse 6500. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET DASH strong late run. HARD NINETY popped, ran down. JRS TAYLORS MAJESTIC best of others. JGH KATS HAPPY STOLI late push. GAME LITTLE WAGON veered out, bumped, late run. JAZZY CARTEL in mix, veered in, outfinished. MERCI veered in, evenly. ICE COLE JORDAN steadied midway. IM ON FIRST MAN checked, bumped, no factor. BR PILTOS ANGEL awkward start.

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Ninety
ENTRY.OWNER: Lovern Jason and Lovern Pamela Belk

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 300 Y Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS EDEN SUE driving finish. FLAMING EAGLE good speed, lost nod. BIG MAN late push, missed. CINCO DOS ADIOS TEE broke in, bumped, game effort. RL TRAIN FOR BLUE broke in, bumped, 5 in row. TF TOAST TO TIDE closer than looks. LETS FLY BYE bumped twice, good try.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 250 Y Dirt CR: 78. Maiden Purse 18000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANTCONTAINTHEPOWER all out. JEWEL FIRST DASH game second. SHEZA MONEE TRAIN late push. LULU STARR out kicked late. CINDYS CARTER MISS bobbled, ducked in. EYE OF MELONY high headed, erratic. TF MS PREMO TIDE dwelt. A STEWARDS INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO THE START, AFTER A REVIEW IT WAS DETERMINED THAT TF MS PREMO TIDE DWELT AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 400 Y Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 20000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELECTRIC CARTEL drifted in, all out. SANDSTONE bumped, late surge. SAN LORENZO TRAIN drifted out, gamely. CHARTREUSE BLUE hard fought loss. JESS O BLUE even effort. WICKED AND FAST bumped, no bid. FASTDASH PILOT broke out, bumped, drifted in. THISBCANFLY in tight midway, shifted out.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 350 Y Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Claiming Purse 5500. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRACE FOR RED RIVER going away end. JJ SIR RUNAWAY winner too tuff. JTF GAME EAGLE bobbled, late effort. SOMBRA DYNASTY fought hard. EL SONORA game effort. EL CORONA GIRL drifted out sharply.
